isis.stitle: STEERING COLUMN ASSEMBLY, TILT/TELESCOPING - ProStar - DESCRIPTION - CLOCK SPRING

svcproc.title: CLOCK SPRING
svcproc.para: Located under the steering wheel, the clock spring provides transmission of electrical signals and power between the fixed structure of the steering column and the rotating switches that are mounted on the steering wheel. Functions such as horn, light interrupt, cruise control, engine brake, radio, and transmission gear selectors are integrated into the steering wheel control system by using a clock spring.
